name: Shhapp
body:
### Welcome to ShhApp.
This App is used to demonstrate the use of rsa cryptography to encrypt the message.
Source code for this App is available under GNU GPL v3 licence on [google-code](https://code.google.com/p/shh-app/) and on [github](https://github.com/swapnil-kotwal-sp/ShhApp)
This app currently supports to encrypted SMS and emails.The user with private key can decrypt this messages.
Public key may be shared with anybody and user could encrypt the messages using it, but the owner of private key will able to decrypt the messages.
We will implement voice data to encryption in future.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git clone https://github.com/swapnil-kotwal-sp/ShhApp.git
$ Import your android source code into your IDE.
```
### Authors and Contributors
Swapnil kotwal (@swapnil-kotwal-sp),on twitter [Swapnil Kotwal](https://twitter.com/swapnilvkotwal)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Check out the documentation at [ReadMe](https://github.com/swapnil-kotwal-sp/ShhApp#shhapp) or contact swapnilvkotwal@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
